original_text: David arrived at the top of the hill. It was a place where people worshipped God. Hushai, who was an Arkite, met him there. He had torn his clothes and he had dirt on his head.
korean_text: 다윗이 하나님을 경배하는 마루턱에 이를 때에 아렉 사람 후새가 옷을 찢고 흙을 머리에 덮어쓰고 다윗을 맞으러 온지라

sentences.original_text: David arrived at the top of the hill
Hushai, who was an Arkite, met him there
sentences.korean_translation: 아기 사람인 후새가 그곳에서 그를 만났습니다

sentences.original_text: and he had dirt on his head
